long_description: A compact, practical handbook of the 70 most useful knots to know for camping, climbing, fishing and sailing, illustrated with 647 color photographs. Authors: Mario Bigon and Guido Regazzoni. Softcover; 255 pages; 647 color illustrations. Step-by-step instructions take full advantage of color photography to teach the art of tying knots. Pictures show every step looking over the shoulder of the tier, the way you see the knot as you tie it. When two or more ropes are involved, they are color-coded so you can clearly tell them apart. Includes a section on decorative knots, a cross-reference list of the many applications of knots and a detailed glossary.
short_description: A compact, practical handbook of the 70 most useful knots to know for camping, climbing, fishing and sailing, illustrated with 647 color photographs.
